name: GODS Remastered
description: Experience this true-to-original reworked classic Gods for the first time with improved controls and frame rate, with save points and an extensive soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (SP1+, 64Bit version) Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 4.0 support DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 800 MB available space
